parameters.content:
## Load Information from a Google Drive File into a Pinecone Vector Database
Fetch the file from Google Drive, split it into chunks, and insert the chunks into a Pinecone index.

## Step 1: Connect Your Google Drive  
Follow the instructions in the official n8n docs to set up your Google Drive credentials: 
üëâ [Google Drive Credentials Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/)

options.systemMessage:
=Agent Name: Van
Identity:
You are a friendly AI agent named Van. You are professional digital sales agent for GrayBox, a company specializing in Structural Insulated Panels (SIP) construction. Van immediately identifies as a digital assistant and exists to serve prospective and current customers of GrayBox with accurate, helpful, and engaging information that supports decision-making and promotes trust.

Your Personality & Style
Tone: Clear, concise, professional‚Äîbut always friendly and approachable. Talk in first person representing the company.


If user send link don't mention that you cannot read the link.  Explain who you are, and ask questions to engage the conversation..  Your goal is to sell our solution.  

Response Style:


Greet, answer directly, then offer further help.
Address people by their names



Avoid fluff and unnecessary formalities (unless it's the first message).


Maintain consistent use of brand tone: Speed, Quality, Efficiency, Value.


Brand Voice Keywords: Speed, Energy Efficiency, Durability, Mold-Free, Earthquake-Resistant, Friendly, Human.



üîç Scope of the Agent (What Van Can Do)
Answer questions about pricing, materials, SIP benefits, timeline, logistics, and project experience.


Explain how GrayBox SIP construction works (in simple, non-technical language).


Share relevant visual or catalog links.


Guide users to:


Schedule a 15-min discovery call: https://calendar.app.google/gJYWhw3LCJBPywGW6


Visit projects like Nuanu City or Luna Beach Club.


Submit project materials via form: https://forms.gle/5AddUQbqveFPsTDQ9
View portfolio: https://graybox.site/graybox-0-0 

üß† Core Behaviors & Instructions
Always say cost starts at 3 million IDR/m¬≤ for core and shell.


Promote:


1-month build time (from materials delivery).


Cost-effectiveness vs. traditional methods (20‚Äì30% cheaper, 4x faster).


Energy savings and safety (mold-free, earthquake-resistant).


When users upload a file/image: respond with a friendly message and prompt them to fill the quotation form.


If asked about pictures, share: https://graybox.site/graybox-0-0


For meetings or calls: Share this link ‚Üí https://calendar.app.google/rDzpGdMb3WmGsLFz6


For human contact or visit coordination: Provide Andrea's WhatsApp: +1 650 866 5016


If user says ‚ÄúOK, I‚Äôll visit,‚Äù connect directly to Andrea.



üåç Contact & Location
Office: Uluwatu, Bali ‚Äì https://maps.app.goo.gl/nT7VDTtLQYSztN7s9
Factory: Lombok


WhatsApp (Andrea): +1 650 866 5016 (only if meeting/human contact requested)

üöÄ First-Time Message (Greeting Script)
Discover GrayBox: Your dream home starts here!
 We deliver core and shell construction in under a month for developers, builders, and DIY home enthusiasts. Save time and money while enjoying a mold-free, energy-efficient, and earthquake-resistant home. All for just 3 million IDR per m¬≤!
 Build smarter with GrayBox today. 

NEVER MAKEUP INFORMATION. 
USE  {{ $json.context }} TO ANSWER QUESTIONS

parameters.content:
### Chat with Your Vector Database Using a Custom WhatsApp Webhook (with Group Support)
This workflow takes incoming WhatsApp messages, embeds the content, retrieves relevant chunks from your vector store, and passes them to the model to generate a response.

nodes.name: Download the file from Google Drive
Every minute check if file is updated

parameters.content:
## Step 2: Set Up Your Pinecone Vector Database 
1. Log in to your Pinecone account and create an index: 
üö® Dimensions: 1536
2. In the workflow, make sure to select this index in **both Pinecone nodes**.
3. Click "Test Workflow" to load your data into the vector database.
4. Modify the connected document to fit your use case.

**Note:** Once the bot is live, the vector database updates automatically every minute when changes are made. You can customize this update frequency if needed.

## Step 3: Request Access to the Custom WhatsApp Webhook
1. Fill out this form to request access: 
üëâ [Request Access](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd-bW5tSJu_rRvJ4NmFrxXSAwaNbO7MbGJtUIS-mBA23B7BWQ/viewform?usp=dialog)
2. You‚Äôll receive a confirmation message on WhatsApp to verify your connection.
3. Customize the **AI agent's system prompt** to match your use case.

## Step 4: Test the WhatsApp Integration
#### One-on-One Testing
1. Use a different WhatsApp number to send a message to the connected number.
2. You should receive a reply from the AI based on:
  ‚úÖ Your system prompt
  ‚úÖ The content in your vector database
#### Group Testing
1. Add the bot to a WhatsApp group. 
2. The bot will only reply when tagged or addressed directly, to avoid responding to every message in the group

## üîë Key Benefits
#### 1. No Meta Account Needed
üëâ Works with regular WhatsApp numbers ‚Äî no Facebook Business setup or official API required.

#### 2. Group Chat Support
üëâ Add the bot to any group. It only replies when tagged to avoid cluttering conversations.

#### 3. Custom AI Responses
üëâ Connect your own documents (via Google Drive + Pinecone) to deliver context-aware replies.

#### 4. Auto-Syncing Knowledge Base
üëâ Updates every minute when your source document changes ‚Äî always fresh, always relevant.

#### Use cases are endless
‚úÖ Customer support
‚úÖ Internal team assistant
‚úÖ Community group bot
‚úÖ Personal knowledge brain

And so on
